subsection.title: Non-essential profile details
subsection.p: It is not essential that you enter all profile details such as Email address, Jabber user name, Version control user name and User icon.

bullets.item: Email address - if added you will be able to subscribe to feeds to specified email address.
Jabber user name - if added Mingle displays your correct name on the Murmurs tab when you Murmur via a Jabber chat room.
Version control user name - if added Mingle displays your correct name on the Source tab.
User icon - if added your personal icon will appear next to your name in some places in Mingle. If no icon is supplied a default will be used.
